typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Province as string,
		City as string,
		CityCode as string,
		Lat as string,
		Lon as string,
		Confirmed as string,
		Deaths as string,
		Recovered as string,
		Active as string,
		Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source(output(
		Country as string,
		CountryCode as string,
		Province as string,
		City as string,
		CityCode as string,
		Lat as string,
		Lon as string,
		Confirmed as string,
		Deaths as string,
		Recovered as string,
		Active as string,
		Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source2
source1, source2 union(byName: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1))~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
